channel.title: CSM Operator on
channel.description: Recent content in CSM Operator on

item.title: CSI to CSM Operator Migration
item.description: Migration Steps Save the CR yaml file of the current CSI driver to preserve the settings. Use the following commands in your cluster to get the CR: kubectl -n <namespace> get <CRD_kind> kubectl -n <namespace> get <CRD_kind>/<CR_name> -o yaml Example for CSI Unity: kubectl -n openshift-operators get CSIUnity kubectl -n openshift-operators get CSIUnity/test-unity -o yaml Map and update the settings from the CR in step 1 to the relevant CSM Operator CR (found in csm-operator repository).
